forgot_password_description: Enter your email address and we'll send you a link to reset your password.
forgot_password_success: If the email address is registered in our system, you will receive an email with a link to reset your password shortly.
forgot_password_error: An error occurred. Please try again later.
reset_password_success: Your password has been changed successfully! You can now log in with your new password.
reset_password_error: Failed to reset password. The link is invalid or has expired.
reset_password_invalid_link: Invalid or missing password reset link.
